items.sentence: Every time I read this book, I find something new.
I can build your dog a doghouse if you want me to.
I have a friend whose father is a famous novelist.
I just got up. Give me a few minutes to get ready.
I speak French more fluently than I speak English.
I talked with my parents about my studying abroad.
I think you and I had better have a talk with Tom.
Your sister is lazier than all the other students.
Tom, you\'re an adult now. Try to behave like one.
Try to make sure Tom doesn\'t do something stupid.
